content: When the passage finally ends in a small cave-like room, you'll find a Red-Haired Yaksha on the right guarding the final Buddha statue to pray at.

The content is as follows:
When the passage finally ends in a small cave-like room, you'll find a Red-Haired Yaksha on the right guarding the final Buddha statue to pray at.
